channel.title: First time Marijuana smoker
channel.description:
Alright, well me and a friend (hes smoked a few times) are gonna buy some weed this weekend and smoke it out of a pop can made bowl.. I've never smoked anything my whole life and I wanna get blazed and like it.. Any tips?
Usually people don't like it there first time or get high. I wanna be an exception :).

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @Starting_up Starting up ...

@Starting_up wrote:

Oh, sorry guys. Thought this thread died. But all went well except something which I’m abt to post as a new thread?

Read full topic

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

I followed the old “draw before beer and you’re in the clear, beer before draw and you’re on the floor” rule but tbh I find that I can do it either way and be fine whereas on occasion I’ve ended up very much on the floor, puking my guts out even though I’ve followed the rule religiously. I guess it all depends on the potency of the weed, how much alcohol, whether you’ve eaten etccc

PS drunk and high is amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Anyways I agree that for his first time he shouldn’t be drunk.

But I guess me and most people I know have high tolerance to weed. I always smoke it several times through out the night, but I make sure I’m decently drunk first because otherwise I don’t feel like drinking anymore. [size=1pt]and then we do mdma, come down, do more mdma, come down, do ketamine until the next afternoon and go to sleep, repeat for 50 days straight[/hardcore nigger][/size]

Read full topic

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:21, topic:327304”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=423696.msg3112678#msg3112678 date=1264672008]
Re: breathing it in right.

if you don’t know how, just breath in some mari smoke, then take a deep breath afterwards. It will go into your lungs.
Then you’ll eventually get the hang of it.
[/quote]
What’s so hard about breathing in? I breath in like every second of my life[/quote]
I think we all breath every second of our life.

Meaning into the lungs, not bum puffing.

Read full topic

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Yeah, the first time I smoked weed I didn’t inhale properly so I didn’t notice anything.
Friends of mine have been very ill on a schooltrip(!) when they smoked weed and drunk alcohol afterwards, so be careful.

Read full topic

item.title: First time Marijuana smoker
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

You probably wont notice your baked until you break out laughing at random shit (like your shoes or something). It might burn your throat. Don’t take too many big hits your first time you’ll probably end up vomiting if you do.

Um pop some oxycottin for added affect ;).

Read full topic
